title: How much do accordions cost? - Quora

response.answer_text: The cost of an accordion depends on the exact type and quality of accordion and its condition. Patience and careful shopping on the used market—EBay, Craigslist, etc.—can get you a decent, playable accordion (piano or button) for $200 to $400. A new accordion from a high-end maker can cost $12,000. Look for Italian or German made instruments. I got my accordion for free when I found it in an abandoned locker I was cleaning out and the building owner let me keep it. It’s of good quality and all the notes work and are in tune—but I was surprised to find a similar one on EBay for just a few hundred dollars.
